short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Achieve Better AI Answers 73% more often with Multiple Chatbots

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Remail is your AI Copilot wherever you need. Writes emails, reads articles, searches smartly wherever you need.

🔥 Remail is your all-in-one AI assistant. 
Hit Cmd/Ctrl + M, and you're in with it.
We offer assistance in various tasks including email writing, reading, writing, translating, drawing, and many more.

✨The Key Features:


🌐  Chat with multiple AI models
  ✔️ Chat and Compare all LLMs in one place: chat with various LLM models like ChatGPT, Bard, Claude, Llama in one place.
  ✔️Real-Time: obtain current real-time internet information.
  ✔️Mixture AI: Mixture AI synthesizes the outputs from ChatGPT-4o, Gemini 1.5 Pro, Claude 3.5 Sonnet, and Llama 3.1 into one complete answer.

📧  AI Email
  ✔️Compose and reply to emails 10x faster. In Gmail, we suggest reply options based on email content, allowing click-based responses without typing.
  ✔️Add your website, documents and FAQs to build a knowledge base and train AI to take them into account to generate email based on them.

📖  AI Read
  ✔️ChatPDF: upload and chat with PDF to better understand the content.
  ✔️Chat With Image: upload an image or take a screenshot and ask questions from it.
  ✔️YouTube Summary: get summaries without watching entire videos.
  ✔️

✍️ AI Write
  ✔️Write agent: provide a topic, and we'll auto-draft outlines with expanded content and references.
  ✔️Write agent: speedup your writing a topic with an editor that adapts to your tone, and we'll auto-draft outlines with expanded content.
✔️Ideal for crafting blog entries, scripts, and social media posts.

🎨 AI Art
  ✔️Convert your words into stunning images in seconds!


🛠️  AI Toolkit
  ✔️ Generate notes and flashcards from any source, including YouTube content.


💻 How to use:
🔹Click the "Add to Chrome" button and pin it to the toolbar.
🔹Log in to your account.
🔹Press Cmd/Ctrl+M to wake up Monica.
🔹Start working with AI!

❓ Frequently Asked Questions:
📌 Can I try Remail for free?
- Yes. We provide 7 days free trial.

📌 Do I need a ChatGPT/OpenAI account?
- No, you do not need to have a ChatGPT account to use this extension. You can create a free account.

📌 ChatGPT is banned in my country. Does it work in my country?
- Yes. Our extension works in all countries.

📪 Contact us:
Any questions or suggestions? Please contact us at  💌 contact@remail.ai

Try it now and experience the powerful features of All-in-one AI assistants powered by ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude, Llama, and more!
